description:
You’ll love staying at ourplace because of the location, the quiet and serene street, and the clean and homey atmosphere. The apartment is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. It's close to Grange Bar & Eatery, Starbrucks, and is 20 minutes from the center of NYC.

Ou place is on a quiet, tree-lined street where families and young professionals live. Inside, our home is clean and rustic. We have lots of musical instruments on the wall and homemade furniture from reclaimed wood.

Guests have access to the whole space including two TVs with Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime hooked up and ready, quick wifi, and washer/ dryer in the basement.

We love to help people get comfortable in NYC. When you arrive, there will be a detailed list of recommendations. We're also more than happy to help you and those you'retraveling with find any logistical questions you need!

Our neighborhood, Hamilton Heights, is known for its gorgeous brownstones and greenery. There are three major parks within a ten minute walk, a handful of coffee shops, and new, delicious restaurants. Coming home to this area is wonderful because there are lots of restaurants, coffee shops, and parks, but you can retreat out of the hustle and bustle of midtown.

Our place is super convenient with 2 major subways about 5-10 minute walk away.  Columbus circle is an 11 minute ride away, and just 15 minute ride to Time Square.
name: Rustic 1BR on Tree-Lined St. in Hamilton Heights
review: Viajamos en familia y nuestro viaje a NY fue maravilloso no solo por la belleza de la ciudad sino también porque al final del día sentíamos la felicidad de quién vuelve al hogar. Amamos NY, amamos Harlem y amamos tu apartamento. Gracias y esperamos volver pronto
